Content-Type: text/plain;

Hello all-

There's been some good coverage of CPPNs/HyperNEAT in the press=
 lately and we'd like to see if we can get it on Slashdot. It would be fun =
to see what Slashdot users can create on EndlessForms.com, especially since=
 the objects on the site only get better as more people participate.  

Tom=
orrow (Thursday) at 1pm Eastern Time (Sept. 22nd), Jimmy Secretan (of PicBr=
eeder fame) is going to post a paragraph about EndlessForms/CPPNs/HyperNEAT=
 on slashdot. Please help our chances by voting for the story via the plus =
sign next to it. 

You'll have to have an account to vote. You will be able=
 to find the story here:

http://slashdot.org/firehose

Hopefully it'll be =
on the first page, but maybe not. The direct link to the post doesn't let y=
ou vote, so it will require some browsing/searching. We'll send out the tit=
le of the post when it is ready. 

Hopefully this will increase the awarene=
ss of CPPNs, HyperNEAT, and crowdsourced exploration of design spaces. Than=
ks very much if you help out.  


Best regards,
Jeff Clune

Postdoctoral Fe=
llow
Hod Lipson's Creative Machines Laboratory
Cornell University
jeffclune=
@...
jeffclune.com


--Apple-Mail-308--980746713
